channel.title: A Megan website on A Megan website
channel.author: Alexander Ivanov

item.title: About
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: Hello there! My name is Megan, and I am a hard-working and passionate researcher eager to create equitable and prosperous cities. I care about social and economic inequalities, and spent the last two years at McGill University researching how these impact urban population health. I now working to increase capacity for open and transparent government at OpenNorth.
